articles.title: Olympic Wrestling Day 11: USA's Mensah takes gold - NBC Olympics
articles.description: American wrestler Tamyra Mensah won gold in the women's 68kg freestyle Tuesday at the Tokyo Olympics. In men's Greco-Roman wrestling, Hungary's Tamas Lorincz won the 77kg class, and Russia's Artur Aleksanyan took the 97kg gold.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Simone Biles returns to competition, wins bronze in balance beam - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The American gymnastics superstar won bronze during the balance beam final on Tuesday, a week after she took herself out of several competitions to focus on her mental health.

articles.title: Simone Biles caps remarkable return with Olympic bronze in beam final - The42
articles.description: The American was back competing after withdrawing early in the women’s team final last week, citing a desire to protect her mental health.
